---
title: Update a capital deposit company
---

# Update a capital deposit company

Use the API to update the company information linked to a capital deposit case.

import UpdateCompanyPrereqs from './partials/_update-company-prereqs.mdx';

:::tip Prerequisites
<UpdateCompanyPrereqs />
:::

## Guide {#steps}

1. Call the `updateCapitalDepositCompany` mutation.
1. Add the capital deposit case ID.
1. Add the fields you want to update: `companyName` and/or `residencyAddress`.
1. Add the success payload and any information you'd like to receive.
1. Add rejections (not shown).

:::info Automatic synchronization
Updating these fields automatically syncs the data across both the capital deposit case and the associated account holder.
:::

## Mutation {#mutation}

<a href="https://explorer.swan.io?&tab=api" className="explorer-badge">Open in API Explorer</a>

```graphql {2-4} showLineNumbers
mutation UpdateCompany {
  updateCapitalDepositCompany(
    input: {
      id: "$CAPITAL_DEPOSIT_CASE_ID"
      companyName: "Acme"
      residencyAddress: {
        addressLine1: "10 Rue de Rivoli"
        city: "Paris"
        postalCode: "75001"
        state: "ÃŽle-de-France"
        country: "FRA"
      }
    }
  ) {
    ... on UpdateCapitalDepositCompanySuccessPayload {
      __typename
      capitalDepositCase {
        id
        companyName
        companyOnboarding {
          accountHolder {
            info {
              name
            }
            residencyAddress {
              addressLine1
              city
              postalCode
              country
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Payload {#payload}

```graphql {6-7,11,14-18} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "updateCapitalDepositCompany": {
      "__typename": "UpdateCapitalDepositCompanySuccessPayload",
      "capitalDepositCase": {
        "id": "$CAPITAL_DEPOSIT_CASE_ID",
        "companyName": "Acme",
        "companyOnboarding": {
          "accountHolder": {
            "info": {
              "name": "Acme"
            },
            "residencyAddress": {
              "addressLine1": "10 Rue de Rivoli",
              "city": "Paris",
              "postalCode": "75001",
              "country": "FRA"
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```
